body: It's probably her own house. I'm guessing she cheated so that's why they are getting a divorce. It's not like she doesn't love him just that she is one hell of a horny woman. It is what it is. He was probably considering giving her a chance and let the guy stay to test her, to what I say: what a low move ma' man. If she couldn't resist while married now drunk and about to be completely single kinda. She was setup to fail XD
so she is getting hubby's house
Husband should have just say get fu*k out of my house
Not bad, but i cant shake the feeling of something just doesnt feel right.
